title: Dating for Women
subtitle: Choose wisely, connect deeply, stay true to yourself
description: Dating as a woman means navigating a landscape where you're often pursued but rarely truly seen. This course helps you discern quality partners, maintain your standards without closing off, communicate what you want, and build connections with men who are actually worth your time.

modules.title: Your Relationship with Men
modules.description: Examining your beliefs, fears, and patterns

modules.title: Grounded Femininity
modules.description: Receptivity without passivity, softness without weakness

modules.title: Discerning Quality
modules.description: Red flags, green flags, and trusting your gut

modules.title: Standards Without Walls
modules.description: Knowing what you want without shutting people out

modules.title: Communicating What You Want
modules.description: Direct without demanding, clear without controlling

whatYouLearn: Examine and update your beliefs about men and dating
Communicate your wants and needs clearly
Set the pace of intimacy that works for you
Navigate the transition to committed relationship
requirements: Attraction Fundamentals or solid understanding of what creates connection
Willingness to examine your patterns honestly

questions.question: What is 'grounded femininity'?
options: Receptivity and softness combined with strength and clear boundaries

questions.question: What's the difference between standards and walls?
options: Standards filter for quality while staying open; walls shut everyone out from fear

questions.question: How should you communicate what you want?
options: Drop hints and hope he figures it out
Direct and clear, without being demanding or controlling
Never say what you want—let him lead everything

questions.question: Who should set the pace of intimacy?
options: You—based on what feels right for your body and heart

questions.question: What's a key green flag in a man?
options: He's very persistent even when you say no
His words and actions align, he respects your boundaries, and he shows up consistently
